snippet: Relatives of the bride-to-be and the best man who died questioned why charges were brought against the boat’s driver ahead of toxicology results.
abstract: Relatives of Lindsey Stewart and Mark Lennon, bride-to-be and best man who died  in boating accident on Hudson River, question why charges were brought against boat’s driver ahead of toxicology results; Jojo K John is charged with vehicular manslaughter and vehicular assault in incident; police say charges were based on officer observation at scene, but families have released statement saying they believe all onboard were sober.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of the bride-to-be and the best man who died questioned why charges were brought against the boat’s driver ahead of toxicology results.

headline.main: Mourning Victims and Assigning Blame After Fatal Boat Crash on the Hudson
headline.print_headline: Mourning Victims and Assigning Blame After Fatal Boat Crash on the Hudson
